医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
上呼吸道标本可以用来诊断结核病吗？上呼吸道样本对活动性肺结核（TB）的诊断准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Can-upper-respiratory-tract-specimens-be-used-to-diagnose-Tuberculosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Can-upper-respiratory-tract-specimens-be-used-to-diagnose-Tuberculosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c7da14a-934d-4fe4-ba2b-47486fa56657 Fri, 15 Sep 2023 06:44:00 -0400 Can upper respiratory tract specimens be used to diagnose Tuberculosis?
农村疗养院的支持者担心拟议的人员配备标准将导致更多的关闭许多像这样的农村社区都面临着医疗保健困境：是拥有一所难以雇用工人的疗养院更好，还是根本没有疗养院更好？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Rural-nursing-home-supporters-fear-proposed-staffing-standards-will-trigger-more-closures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Rural-nursing-home-supporters-fear-proposed-staffing-standards-will-trigger-more-closures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4239ebb7-a4b3-45a9-96d9-ee3a965e94b0 Fri, 15 Sep 2023 06:43:31 -0400 Rural nursing home supporters fear proposed staffing standards will trigger more closures
一个新的 covid 助推器就在这里。那些风险最大的人会得到它吗？美国疾病控制与预防中心建议所有人接种新的 covid-19 加强疫苗，但许多最需要疫苗的人却无法接种。大约 75% 的美国人似乎跳过了去年的二价加强剂，而且没有任何迹象表明这次的吸收率会更好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/A-new-covid-booster-is-here-Will-those-at-greatest-risk-get-it.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/A-new-covid-booster-is-here-Will-those-at-greatest-risk-get-it.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5480c1eb-f42f-4af8-a3d6-151bd5bb14d9 Fri, 15 Sep 2023 06:43:26 -0400 A new covid booster is here. Will those at greatest risk get it?
社会保障为人们支付了数十亿美元的超额费用，其中许多人是残疾人。然后它要求退款。 47 岁的贾斯蒂娜·沃雷尔 (Justina Worrell) 在俄亥俄州一家疗养院做兼职厨房帮手。她患有脑瘫、智力障碍和心脏病，需要在 20 岁时接受人工心脏瓣膜。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Social-Security-overpays-billions-to-people-many-on-disability-Then-it-asks-for-the-money-back.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Social-Security-overpays-billions-to-people-many-on-disability-Then-it-asks-for-the-money-back.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42b92f00-5d88-42ba-852f-a4981fbe8e19 Fri, 15 Sep 2023 06:42:48 -0400 Social Security overpays billions to people, many on disability. Then it asks for the money back.
系统性幼年类风湿性关节炎与 1 型糖尿病之间的比较基因组分析sJRA 和 T1D 具有共同的遗传标记和免疫系统参与。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Comparative-genomic-analysis- Between-systemic-juvenile-rheumatoid-arthritis-and-type-1-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Comparative-genomic-analysis- Between-systemic-juvenile-rheumatoid-arthritis-and-type-1-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cec721eb-db6c-47eb-a7ef-ecf60af586ae Fri, 15 Sep 2023 06:03:00 -0400 Comparative genomic analysis between systemic juvenile rheumatoid arthritis and type 1 diabetes
腰小腿围比与全因和特定原因死亡率之间是否存在关联？ WCR 等人体测量指标如何与老年人的特定原因和全因死亡率相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Is-there-an-association- Between-waist-calf-circumference-ratio-and-all-cause-and-cause-specific-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Is-there-an-association- Between-waist-calf-circumference-ratio-and-all-cause-and-cause-specific-mortality.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b3e84d4-1bbd-4b33-89d7-b5a57f0713d4 Fri, 15 Sep 2023 05:25:00 -0400 Is there an association between waist-calf circumference ratio and all-cause and cause-specific mortality?
3 期研究：单价 SARS-CoV-2 疫苗与 AS03 佐剂对成人的疗效新型单价重组蛋白疫苗针对严重急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒 2 (SARS-CoV-2) 的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Phase-3-study-The-efficacy-of-monovalent-SARS-CoV-2-vaccine-with-AS03-adjuvant-in-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Phase-3-study-The-efficacy-of-monovalent-SARS-CoV-2-vaccine-with-AS03-adjuvant-in-adults.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4bb67227-e9fd-4ceb-b710-30919f38cc7b Fri, 15 Sep 2023 05:14:00 -0400 Phase 3 study: The efficacy of monovalent SARS-CoV-2 vaccine with AS03 adjuvant in adults
枫糖浆是终极天然甜味剂吗？研究人员表示，它不仅仅是美味！科学家们探索了枫糖浆的无数好处，揭示了它相对于传统甜味剂的营养、药理和感官优势。从抗氧化和抗炎特性到控制血糖，甚至潜在的抗癌作用，枫糖浆不仅仅是一种美味的配料。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Is-maple-syrup-the-ultimate-natural-sweetener-Researchers-say-its-more-than-just-tasty!.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Is-maple-syrup-the-ultimate-natural-sweetener-Researchers-say-its-more-than-just-tasty!.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d78915c1-ebd4-400f-b23c-cbd7449c2583 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 22:42:00 -0400 Is maple syrup the ultimate natural sweetener? Researchers say it's more than just tasty!
释放凝集素的力量：BOA 成为对抗所有 SARS-CoV-2 变种的有力武器研究人员发现，像 BOA 这样的抗病毒凝集素可以通过靶向刺突聚糖来有效抑制 SARS-CoV-2 及其变体，为潜在的泛冠状病毒治疗打开了大门。该研究表明，BOA 的多价相互作用使其成为一系列病毒变体的有效抑制剂，为未来的治疗策略带来了希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Unlocking-the-power-of-lectins-BOA-emerges-as-a-potted-weapon-against-all-SARS-CoV-2-variants。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Unlocking-the-power-of-lectins-BOA-emerges-as-a-potted-weapon-against-all-SARS-CoV-2-variants。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81663d8d-5632-416f-a961-458d60e4bf3c Thu, 14 Sep 2023 21:36:00 -0400 Unlocking the power of lectins: BOA emerges as a potent weapon against all SARS-CoV-2 variants
过去的感染可能会影响你的新冠疫苗加强剂对抗 Omicron 的效果这项深入研究探讨了先前的免疫力如何影响 COVID-19 加强疫苗接种的有效性以及对 Omicron 突破性感染的易感性。该研究强调了个体免疫史在塑造针对 SARS-CoV-2 的体液和细胞反应中的重要作用，敦促制定更有针对性的疫苗策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Past-infections-may-shape-your-COVID-boosters-punch-against-Omicron.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Past-infections-may-shape-your-COVID-boosters-punch-against-Omicron.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6edb3d0e-9ac3-4f92-acce-1c5004c9dca8 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 21:26:00 -0400 Past infections may shape your COVID booster's punch against Omicron
